ARABIC: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not grieve over them and do not let the plots they make distress you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not grieve over them, and do not be distressed by what they contrive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), do not grieve over them, nor be distressed at their designs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), do not be grieved (about their disbelief) nor distressed about their evil plans against you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And do not grieve upon them, nor be distressed because of their scheming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And grieve you not over them, nor be straitened (in distress) because of what they plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And grieve not for them and be not distressed because of what they plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Do not sorrow for them, nor be thou straitened for what they devise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And grieve thou not for them, nor be in distress because of what they plot (against thee).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not grieve over them, nor feel distressed at their schemes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And grieve thou not over them nor be straitened because of that which they plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not grieve for them, and do not be upset by their guile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But grieve not over them, nor distress thyself because of their plots.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And grieve you not for them, nor be straitened (in distress) because of what they plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not be sorry for them, nor be distressed for what they devise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But do not grieve over them, and do not be troubled by what they plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:70] And do not grieve for them, and do not be distressed by their schemes — this is meant to comfort the Prophet (s), in other words, do not be concerned with their plotting against you, for We will grant you victory over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And grieve thou not) Muhammad (for them) if they do not believe; it is also said that this means: do not grieve for their destruction, (nor be in distress because of what they plot (against you)) and do not be grieved because of what they do and say against you.
